item.title: Albino Rat
item.description: Albino Rat Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes (includes additional set of eyes) Removable / interchangable eye-lids Soft rubbery ears Socketed replaceable teeth Size adjustable liner Fully cast-in-place lined interior Shaped neck Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used Floor dragger tail with zipper and pocket containing beads so it can easily be washed Custom heart shape embroidery on the tail Loop on tail to allow it to be attached to a belt so it doesn’t drag on the floor NFC tag on left size of muzzle Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and 3D printed teeth and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.

item.title: Rottweiler
item.description: Rottweiler Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes Soft floppy bonded fabric ears Socketed teeth Removable / interchangable eye-lids Size adjustable liner Fully cast-in-place lined interior Shaped neck Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used Magnets in the cheeks & magnetic tongue Velcro Tongue Custom embroidered tail Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and 3D printed teeth and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.

item.title: Spotted Hyena
item.description: Natural Color Spotted Hyena Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes (includes additional set of eye backers) Removable / interchangable eye-lids Rubbery ears Socketed teeth Size adjustable liner

item.title: Lavender Punk Otter
item.description: Cyan Punk Otter Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes Size adjustable liner Fully cast-in-place lined interior Dinosaur inspired spikes on the tail Removable Velcro-in-place mohawk, to allow alternative hair styles Removable / interchangable eye-lids Embroidered knuckle tattoos that say ‘FISH’ ‘HOOK’ - cause you know otter paws are fish hooks… Shaped neck Ear gauges Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics Floor dragger tail with zipper and pocket containing beads so it can easily be washed Custom embroidery on the tail Loop on tail to allow it to be attached to a belt so it doesn’t drag on the floor Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and 3D printed teeth and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.

item.title: Kauer
item.description: Kauer Kauer is a full commission suit that is made for a customer, he’s a plantigrade rat suit. Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes Soft rubbery ears Socketed teeth Size adjustable liner Fully castinplace lined interior Shaped neck Velcro-in-place tongue Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and 3D printed teeth and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.

item.title: Rusty
item.description: Rusty Rusty is a full plantigrade wild boar fursuit I made for myself, he was made on a whim. I choose natural colors and I really wanted an aggressive punky look. Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.

item.title: Linus Elk
item.description: Linus Linus has detacable lighweight antlers and posable ears, the head is cast in polyurethane foam.

Instructions Wearing It’s recommended that you wear a balaclava when wearing your fursuit head to help keep it fresh and clean. The zipper on the back of the head is utilized for construction and servicing of the head, you should not need to use to place the fursuit head on your head. Your head contains two 5V blowers and an attached USB cable, you can use a small USB battery pack to power these blowers.

item.title: about
item.description: synanthrope (noun) - an animal that is adjacent to, but outside the control of humans. Intro I like making fursuits, it’s my artistic output! I make fursuits for myself and others and occasionally sell partials. You can see my featured suits or check out all my full suits. Stuff I’m really proud of Featured Suits By type full partial By Year 2024 2023 2022 2020 2019

item.title: contact
item.description: If you want to contact me, please message me on one of these services: https://fursuits.online/@kcanis https://bsky.app/profile/kcanis.bsky.social https://twitter.com/kelarcanis

item.title: faq
item.description: What is a synanthrope? A synanthrope is an animal which is not deomesticated, but hangs around humans, and is outside of their control. Are you open for commissions? No not at the moment. How can I contact you Please direct message me through my Mastodon or Bluesky account.

item.title: prices
item.description: Prices are subject to change based upon specific suit features and design elements. These prices do not include shipping or sales tax Item Price (in USD$) Head 2800$ Eyes 100$ Hand paws 350$ Tail 350$ Foot paws 350$ Plantigrade body 2000$ Digitigrade body 2800$
